nt_bdr wrote:
> Is the version of Heretrix that that has the option to turn off
> ExtractorHTML Javascript extraction available for download? If so can
> you please provide me the link?

No official, tested release has yet been made including this feature.

Automatic builds from the CVS HEAD -- the latest code under source 
control -- are available from the continuous build box, at:

   http://builds.archive.org:8080/cruisecontrol/

Look for 'HEAD-Heritrix' then 'Build artifacts'.

Keep in mind that such builds are 'bleeding edge' and may contain 
not-yet-documented changes, new bugs, and other issues.

- Gordon @ IA
